title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Cognitive Scaffolding Design for Argumentative Writing and Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish three or more argumentative writing structures for solving mathematical problems
Learners can present logical counterarguments with over 80% participation by utilizing cognitive scaffolding in collaborative discussions
Learners can write one argumentative essay per week reflecting peer feedback and achieve over 85% proficiency based on the rubric criteria
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
